TFTCG Aequitas Draft FAQ
FAQ / Wave 4 / Battle Cards /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Stable Cover

  1. Does Jazz's ability work with Stable Cover? Stable Cover implies that the enemy still has Pierce, they just can't use it, while Jazz states "an enemy that doesn't have Pierce". [Source: Aequitas]
    As you said, the enemy still has Pierce so Jazz's alt mode ability does not trigger.
